Verses: 1 seenaai Malaiyil Karththar Moseyode Pesina Naalile, Aaron Mose Enbavargaludaiya Vamsavaralaaraavadhu:
2 aaronudaiya Kumaarar, Mudhal Pirandhavanaagiya Naadhaap, Apiyoo, Eleyaasaar, Iththaamaar Enbavargale.
3 aasaariya Oozhiyamseygiradharku Avanaal Pradhishtai Seyyappattu Abishegampetra Aasaariyaraana Aaronudaiya Kumaararin Naamangal Ivaigale.

4 naadhaapum Apiyoovum Seenaai Vanaandharaththil Anniya Akkiniyaik Karththarudaiyasannidhiyil Konduvandhapodhu, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Mariththupponaargal; Avargalukkup Pillaigal Illai; Eleyaasaarum Iththaamaarume Thangal Thagappanaagiya Aaronukku Munbaaga Aasaariya Oozhiyam Seydhaargal.
5 karththar Moseyai Nokki:
6 nee Levikoththiraththaarai Serththu, Avargal Aasaariyanaagiya Aaronukkup Panividaiseyyumpadi Avargalai Niruththu.
7 avargal Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukku Munbaaga Avanudaiya Kaavalaiyum Ellaa Sabaiyin Kaavalaiyum Kaaththu, Vaasasthalaththin Panividai Velaigalai Seyyakkadavargal.
8 avargal Aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Thattumuttu Mudhalaanavaigalaiyum, Isravel Puththirarin Kaavalaiyum Kaaththu, Vaasasthalaththin Panividaigalai Seyyakkadavargal.
9 aagaiyaal Leviyarai Aaronidaththilum Avan Kumaararidaththilum Oppukkoduppaayaaga; Isravel Puththiraril Ivargal Mutrilum Avanukku Oppukkodukkappattirukkiraargal.
10 aaronaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyumo, Thangal Aasaariya Oozhiyaththai Seyvadharkaaga Niyamikkakkadavaai, Andha Oozhiyaththai Seyyumpadi Serugira Anniyan Kolaiseyyappadakkadavan Endraar.
11 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
12 isravel Puththiraril Garppanthirandhu Pirakkira Mudharperaana Yaavukkum Padhilaaga, Naan Leviyarai Isravel Puththirarilirundhu Eduththukkonden; Avargal Ennudaiyavargalaayirukkiraargal.

13 mudharperaanavaiyellaam Ennudaiyavai; Naan Egipthudhesaththil Mudharperaana Yaavaiyum Sangariththa Naalil, Isravelil Manidharmudhal Mirugajeevanmattumulla Mudharperaana Yaavaiyum Enakkendru Parisuththappaduththinadhinaale, Avaigal Ennudaiyavaigalaayirukkum; Naan Karththar Endraar.
14 pinnum Karththar Seenaai Vanaandharaththil Moseyai Nokki:
15 levipuththirarai Avargal Pidhaakkalin Vamsangalinpadiye Ennuvaayaaga; Avargalil Oru Maadham Mudhal Adharku Merpatta Vayadhulla Aanpillaigalaiyellaam Ennuvaayaaga Endraar.
16 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Vaakkinpadi, Mose Thanakkuk Karpikkappatta Pragaaram Avargalai Enninaan.
17 leviyin Kumaarar Thangal Naamangalinpadiye, Kerson, Kokaadh, Meraari Enbavargal.
18 thangal Vamsaththinpadiye Kersonudaiya Kumaararin Naamangal, Lipni, Seemeyi Enbavaigal.
19 thangal Vamsangalinpadiye Kokaaththudaiya Kumaarar, Amraam, Idhseyaar, Epron, Oosiyel Enbavargal.
20 thangal Vamsangalinpadiye Meraariyinudaiya Kumaarar, Makeli, Moosi Enbavargal; Ivargale Leviyarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Vamsaththaar.
21 kersonin Vazhiyaai Lipneeyarin Vamsamum Seemeyiyar Vamsamum Thondrina; Ivaigale Kersoniyarin Vamsangal.
22 avargalil Oru Maadham Mudhal Adharku Merpatta Vayadhulla Aanpillaigalellaam Ennappattapodhu, Ennappattavargal Ezhaayiraththu Ainnooruperaayirundhaargal.
23 kersoniyarin Vamsangal Vaasasthalaththin Pinpuraththil Merke Paalayamirangavendum.
24 kersoniyarudaiya Thagappan Vamsaththukkuth Thalaivan Laayelin Kumaaranaagiya Eliyaasaap Enbavan.
25 aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Kerson Puththirarin Kaavalaavadhu: Vaasasthalamum, Koodaaramum, Adhin Moodiyum, Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasal Maraivum,
26 vaasasthalaththandaiyilum Palipeedaththandaiyilum Sutrilum Irukkira Praagaaraththin Thonguthiraigalum, Praagaaravaasal Mooduthiraiyum, Avaigalin Velaigalukkellaam Uriya Avaigalin Kayirugalume.
27 kokaaththin Vazhiyaai Amraamiyarin Vamsamum Idhseyaarin Vamsamum Eproniyarin Vamsamum Oosiyelarin Vamsamum Thondrina; Ivaigale Kokaaththiyarin Vamsangal.
28 oru Maadhammudhal Adharku Merpatta Vayadhulla Aanpillaigalellaam Ennappattapodhu, Parisuththa Sthalaththukkuriyavaigalaik Kaappavargal, Ennaayiraththu Arunooruperaayirundhaargal.
29 kokaadh Puththirarin Vamsangal Vaasasthalaththin Thenpuramaana Pakkaththile Paalayamirangavendum.
30 avargalin Thalaivan, Oosiyelin Kumaaranaagiya Elsaapaan.

31 avargaludaiya Kaavalaavadhu: Pettiyum, Mejaiyum, Kuththuvilakkum, Peedangalum, Aaraadhanaikketra Parisuththa Sthalaththin Panimuttugalum, Thonguthiraiyum, Adhinudaiya Ellaa Velaigalukkum Etravaigalume.
32 aasaariyanaagiya Aaronin Kumaaran Eleyaasaar Enbavan Leviyarudaiya Thalaivargalukkuth Thalaivanaaip Parisuththa Sthalaththaik Kaavalkaakkiravargalukku Visaarippukkaaranaayirukkavendum.
33 meraariyin Vazhiyaai Makeliyarin Vamsamum Moosiyarin Vamsamum Thondrina; Ivaigale Meraariyin Vamsangal.
34 avargalil Oru Maadhammudhal Adharku Merpatta Vayadhulla Aanpillaigalellaam Ennappattapodhu, Ennappattavargal Aaraayiraththu Irunooruperaayirundhaargal.
35 apiyaayelin Kumaaranaagiya Sooriyel Enbavan Avargalukkuth Thalaivanaayirundhaan; Ivargal Vaasasthalaththin Vadapuramaana Pakkaththil Paalayamirangavendum.
36 avargaludaiya Kaaval Visaarippaavadhu: Vaasasthalaththin Palagaigalum, Thaazhppaalgalum, Thoongalum, Paadhangalum Adhinudaiya Ellaap Panimuttugalum, Adharkaduththavaigal Anaiththum,
37 sutruppraagaaraththin Thoongalum, Avaigalin Paadhangalum, Mulaigalum, Kayirugalume.

38 aasarippuk Koodaaramaagiya Vaasasthalaththukku Munbaaga, Sooriyan Udhikkum Keezhppuraththile Moseyum Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Koodaarangalaip Pottu Irangi, Isravel Puththirarin Kaavalukku Badhilaagap Parisuththa Sthalaththaik Kaaval Kaakkavendum. Vaasasthalaththil Serugira Anniyan Kolaiseyyappadakkadavan.

39 moseyum Aaronum, Karththarudaiya Vaakkinpadi, Leviyaril Oru Maadhammudhal Adharku Merpatta Vayadhulla Aanpillaigalaiyellaam Avargaludaiya Vamsangalinpadi Enninaargal; Avargal Irubaththeeraayiram Peraayirundhaargal.
40 adhanpinbu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Isravel Puththiraril Orumaadham Mudhal Adharku Merpatta Vayadhulla Mudharperaana Aanpillaigalaiyellaam Enni, Avargal Naamangalaith Thogaiyetri,

41 isravel Puththirarilulla Mudharperaana Yaavukkum Badhilaaga Leviyaraiyum, Isravel Puththirarin Mirugajeevangalilulla Thalaiyeetraana Yaavukkum Badhilaaga Leviyarin Mirugajeevangalaiyum Enakkendru Piriththedu; Naan Karththar Endraar.
42 appozhudhu Mose, Karththar Thanakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Isravel Puththirarilulla Mudharperaana Yaavaraiyum Enninaan.
43 oru Maadhammudhal Adharku Merpatta Vayadhulla Mudharperaana Aanpillaigalellaarum Perperaaga Ennappattapodhu, Irubaththeeraayiraththu Irunootru Ezhubaththumoondru Peraayirundhaargal.
44 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

45 nee Isravel Puththirarilulla Mudharperaana Yaavarukkum Badhilaaga Leviyaraiyum, Avargaludaiya Mirugajeevangalukkuppadhilaaga Leviyarin Mirugajeevangalaiyum Piriththedu; Leviyar Ennudaiyavargalaayiruppaargal; Naan Karththar.
46 isravel Puththirarudaiya Mudharperugalil Leviyarin Thogaikku Adhikamaayirundhu, Meetkappadavendiya Irunootru Ezhubaththumoondruperidaththilum,
47 nee Thalaikku Aindhu Sekkal Veedhamaagap Parisuththa Sekkal Kanakkinpadi Vaanguvaayaaga; Andha Sekkalaanadhu Irubadhu Keraa.
48 leviyarudaiya Thogaikku Adhigamaanavargal Meetkappadum Thiraviyaththai Aaronukkum Avan Kumaararukkum Koduppaayaaga Endraar.
49 appadiye Leviyaraal Meetkappattavargalin Thogaikku Adhigamaayirundhu, Innum Meetkappadavendiyavargalukku Eedaaga Mose Isravel Puththirarudaiya Mudharperaanavargalidaththil,
50 aayiraththu Munnootru Arubaththaindhu Sekkalaagiya Thiraviyaththai, Parisuththa Sthalaththu Sekkal Kanakkinpadi Vaangi,
51 karththarudaiya Vaakkinpadiye Meetkappattavargalin Kirayaththai Aaronukkum Avan Kumaararukkum, Karththar Thanakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye Koduththaan.
